website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you are an enthusiast of the brand.
pros: Offers unique features like the no-slip, cushion-grip handles and magnetized tips
cons: Some owners wish the set included a larger variety of screwdrivers
Several of the tools are redundant in shape and size

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic Tips, Convenient Design - Good for PC work.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this set. The tips are magnetic. I purchased mainly to get a few small tools for working on PC's. The smallest two have rotating disks at the handle end making it very convenient to turn screws with your fingers while gentle pressure is put on the screw head with the palm. Happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: They screw things in.
customer_reviews.text: These are just okay. That is all there is to it. It is not a five star product because it lacks quality that my 20 year old screw drivers had. These definitely out perform the other set I just bought, but I would probably spend a little more on something better next time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pregs

customer_reviews.title: Only suitable for occasional work
customer_reviews.text: Although the screwdrivers have nice grips, they appear to be made from unhardened steel and wear out quickly. I used the medium-sized Phillips screwdriver to assemble a few pieces of furniture and it's already sufficiently worn out that it's not usable anymore. Only buy this as a backup set or for occasional use. Avoid if you are looking for something that you expect to use more often.
customer_reviews.author: Krzysztof Kosinski

customer_reviews.title: High quality and low price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my husband, but recently got to use them to assemble an entertainment center. He was wowed by how good the magnetic tips worked. They were comfortable in our hands even after using them for a few hours. I highly recommend these. They're great quality and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: KC_Bearcat

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the money...
customer_reviews.text: Again I bought this set for my Daughter and son-in-law. They did not have any tools and I wanted to scrape together a set of tools for them at Christmas. I bought this 8 piece set hoping it would be a nice set and it was. The grips fit the hands nice and felt like you were actually holding something. This set along with everything else was bought over 2 years ago and now it is 6 states away working on house and I am happy the tools have worked out. Very happy with this purchase along with the others. :)
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent screw driver set.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. A screwdriver for almost any sized screw. I also like the cushion grips on the handles and the highly visible black and yellow color scheme. I supplemented this purchase with a pair of stubby screwdrivers that are sold separately. I only wish that they came with a case to keep them all together. I have made a makeshift one out of the blister pack by cutting 3 sides and using the other as a hinge.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wang

customer_reviews.title: I usually like Stanley products, but this screwdriver set is poor quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the Phillips screwdriver was damaged inserting a stubborn screw and now that screwdriver is useless, the one I'd use the most. So needless to say, I'm not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jim J.

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic tips!  Magnetic tips!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set. So much so, I'm doing to donate the other drivers. I wanted magnetic tips as I have essential tremors and figured I could use the help. The magnetic tips do work! Handles are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: RWinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Had an older set of these Stanley drivers that have been faithful for years. Had to find the product number to search for them. Well worth it. What I like about these specific one's is the actual driver heads are the perfect shape and size, both for depth and width. I just don't strip screws with these. And, they are magnetic and fit your hand well. The only thing is Stanley changed the set to only contain the longer philiips #2 driver, and no longer includes the shorter version... not a biggee...
customer_reviews.author: Joe Pandolfo

customer_reviews.title: Made from poor material.
customer_reviews.text: The screw drivers will bend if you put any kind of force on it. If youre the type to use screw drivers as a leverage tool at times then this set is not for you. Also the metal shaved ovv the driver and not the screw.. wont last you long.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fine for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: It seems that some of the tips are magnetized and others are not. I like the size variety and the length of some of the shafts. Note that these are not hardened tips and that I have already rounded the corners on one of the smaller phillips after a month of use. Good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoors Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, feel great in your hand, fit screws nice, strong magnetic tip. Included picture of packaging when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: zach osborne

customer_reviews.title: They have a comfortable handle and are solidly built
customer_reviews.text: Very solid screwdrivers for the price. They have a comfortable handle and are solidly built. My only gripe is that there is no way to tell which screwdriver it is near the top because it is hard to see the low down label when they are in a bag.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I am not a DYI type. This set of screwdrivers is exactly what I needed for light maintenace/tune-ups around the house. I particularly appreciate the cusion grip, which makes things easy for this person with small and weak hands.
customer_reviews.author: F. C.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Solid craftsmanship. High quality item. Item was exactly as described. It came in a secure package with lots of protective covering to insure no damage. Arrived fast. Seller was communicative. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Luna Lich

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift Success Story
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as a Christmas present after I noticed he went searching for a wrench early in December and couldn't find one. He is pretty handy and knows a great deal about tools (i do not) and was very happy when he opened them Christmas morning. He especially liked the magnetic ends and the soft grips... And noticed both details immediately. Well worth the extra money on the set and glad I purchased these over the regular set with no cushion grips.
customer_reviews.author: PmBurt

customer_reviews.title: good price. The shaft bends easily on the two ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, good price. The shaft bends easily on the two really long screwdrivers with small tips, those could be better quality, and they seem too long for most practical uses, but all the other screwdrivers seem solid.
customer_reviews.author: briann55

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars...Love Stanley products.
customer_reviews.text: Great set.....Had to replace all my old mixed and jumbled tools after garage makeover. Decided to go with Stanley..Love the black and yellow color combination. Like the magnetic tips.
customer_reviews.author: RioHard91

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: real nice, like the handle of them and the magnetic tips are real useful.
customer_reviews.author: Blaqirishman

customer_reviews.title: great set of screw drivers.
customer_reviews.text: These replaced some very OLD screwdrivers I have had for over 30 years from many different places, True Value, Sears and even some from my father that were bought back in the 50s. I bought Stanley because of their quality and trusted name and I am not disappointed. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: AZ4EVER

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for household use! Durable and effective. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rhaspyhonker

customer_reviews.title: A must have for every garage!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of screwdrivers. No more mix matched tools. Great size weight and the handle allows a super grip. The tip are hardened and magnetized with 4 of each size in flathead and phillips head. A great set to get and must have for every garage!
customer_reviews.author: Planoman

customer_reviews.title: Great Screwdriver set.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of screwdrivers and Stanley's awesome warranty to boot. Handles feel great in your hand and allows for more force/torque when loosening or tightening. Quality tool at an awesome price. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: M & N Wessinger

customer_reviews.title: Seems great so far
customer_reviews.text: Seems great so far! Magnets are very good, various sizes seem to cover everything from computer repair up, though I don't think they'd be great for very small things. These are also very long which can be great for some things but just keep it in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Playa

customer_reviews.title: Good screwdrivers good price
customer_reviews.text: Good price they work great haven't had a single issue with them yet durable well made
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Hank

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty with magnetic tips
customer_reviews.text: Nice screwdrivers and love the magnetic tip. (just the tip, hehe)
customer_reviews.author: PatBB

customer_reviews.title: Really like this set
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go-to set for some time. I love the magnetic tips and they have held up well for years now. Solid purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: magnetic tips weak
customer_reviews.text: Magnetic tips won't hold small screw. This was the only reason I bought them. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great set of screwdrivers
customer_reviews.text: Great set of screwdrivers, comes in all the sizes you need, love the magnetic ends or tips on it. Great grip on the handles, good product
customer_reviews.author: Slupo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Our screwdrivers were over 40 years old and these are nice replacements. We love the magnetic part.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Great set of Screwdrivers
customer_reviews.text: These tools are solid. The grips are soft to allow you to hold the screwdriver very tightly without straining your hands. The magnetic tips are perfect to keeping screws in place. I believe these Screwdrivers will last a lifetime because of the quality.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Handles comfortable & the magnet tips work well
customer_reviews.text: As described, fast & well shipped. Handles comfortable & the magnet tips work well.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Silliman

customer_reviews.title: Great Value [or is that phrase a trademark infringement?]
customer_reviews.text: Handy little set to have around. Some sizes are more commonly useful than others, but the magnetism adds value all around. Nice grips Decent lengths Mostly small heads
customer_reviews.author: Bnai Brith

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap Chinese screwdrivers. Work well for my cheap self! Magnetic tips are strong too.
customer_reviews.author: Choose901

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and price. Small symbols on the sides don't do a very good job of identifying philips vs flat, but I wouldn't want color coding like Dewalt does with their competing product. Grip is a nice shape, magnet holds strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great handles and tips are slightly magnetic
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my son. Great handles and tips are slightly magnetic. For the price, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't seem like these will last you very long.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bourne

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought this set years ago. I never realized how nice it is to have a matching set of multiple sizes of screwdrivers.Also important to note that screwdriver tips are magnetized.
customer_reviews.author: P. Robler

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic Heads
customer_reviews.text: Just right for work on my computers. Love the magnetic heads.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Strong and does what it needs to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Scewdrivers
customer_reviews.text: Solid with hard tips, nice grips - what else to say about screwdrivers, I would prefer one larger screwdriver in both Philips head and flat, in place of the smallest of each, Then it would be five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis B. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice set.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Built a workbench with these on 2nd day of owning. The magnetic tips are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: What ever you are working on, one of them will work!
customer_reviews.text: Have used them all already for something. Best buy I have made in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Trina Hopkins - Coffee and Confetti Mom

customer_reviews.title: They are magnetic tipped.
customer_reviews.text: Use for stripping down usable parts from ovens, microwaves, small appliances, vacuums, electric motors and rebuilding same. At $9.99 a set they are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use !
customer_reviews.text: No more slipping when insering or removing metal screws. I love tthese !
customer_reviews.author: Emily Raspe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I love all the different sizes and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I love all the different sizes and they are very study. I feel like a legit handywoman now - long gone is my lightweight pink screwdriver that bent every time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Slcblond

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a Christmas gift for my Dad and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ajw5

customer_reviews.title: I've used them for about a month. They are ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used them for about a month. They are supposed to be hardened but with occasional use they are already showing ware.
customer_reviews.author: JAH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and price.
customer_reviews.text: Good shop tools. Solidly built and appear to be durable,
customer_reviews.author: Buying Fool

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: They work fine for me. I use them for simple around the house tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Msro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tools comes in handle for lots of repair in the house
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: It is very good to have with magnetic so that my small screw ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very good to have with magnetic so that my small screw does not keep fall but with screwdriver is excellent. Some of are very long like hard to reach in narrow to screw it. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J. Urrutia

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, and tips work well
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Work well, sturdy, and tips work well, haven't dropped a screw in days.
customer_reviews.author: Ric Clark

customer_reviews.title: Multi piece driver set for home or shop.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of drivers for many applications. Good ergonomic design.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Handles All The Tasks I Do
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made and the eight drives which are provided in the set handle all the tasks I do, a homeowner and "weekend mechanic".
customer_reviews.author: Laurence K

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel and good construction.
customer_reviews.text: Had a couple of Stanley screwdrivers that I got with a toolbox 20 years ago, loved them. These are the closest to those that I have found and are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Deaf Bear

customer_reviews.title: Very nice grip!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice grip! I have found that they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Love this set of magnetic screwdrivers. Nice fit, and built well
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, fast shipping. Only wish they came with some sort of case -even a cheap one.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Newland

customer_reviews.title: Hubby gives them 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them. They were a gift for Xmas and every time he uses one, he tells me how good they are.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R. Belair

customer_reviews.title: Good grip, nice lengths
customer_reviews.text: Used them for working on PCs and they make life so much easier. Good grip, nice lengths, and magnetized? Yup, sold.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description
customer_reviews.text: Description was that smallest flat head is 2mm, so I ordered entire set just because I need small flat head. When it arrived, smallest flat head is 3mm, so I hardly have use of entire set. It's good set, just description was bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cushioned handles make the work a lot less painful. Also
customer_reviews.text: Cushioned handles make the work a lot less painful. Also, the magnetic tips are a blessing. Helps guide the screws and keeps them from getting lost.
customer_reviews.author: OC/1251

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made with comfortable grips. About all I need in a screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the magnet on screw drivers. don't lose screws any more.
customer_reviews.author: treetrunkusa1776

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, not up to usual Stanley quality standards by any means.  Chi-nah to quote our president... NO BUENO.
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a fan of Stanley tools, but I have to say this set was a disappointment. I purchased it for a very critical PC all-in-one repair project where losing or dropping screws during reassembly of the device would be a HUGE no-no. These "magnetic" screwdrivers were VERY weak, even with very very small and light phillips screws. I actually had to revert to an off-brand screwdriver that worked better and with greater torque than this set. I will be returning these to Amazon, sad to say.
customer_reviews.author: Robert MacIntel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift given to my brother and he enjoys these tools.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe' Goodhue

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality Tools
customer_reviews.text: Garbage product save your money and get a better set. I'm very disappointed as Stanley has made decent tools at reasonable prices for a very long time. I'm not sure what happened to them but these screwdrivers are worthless. They strip more screws than an apprentice mechanic with an impact wrench. Terrible purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rockett

customer_reviews.title: good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: good quality and price .... and as screw drivers they screw
customer_reviews.author: Rick Esterly

customer_reviews.title: 8 piece Screwdriver Set,, professional quality at low price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome screwdriver set..pretty good quality and feel..the set includes the following: one 5/16 x 6 inches long flat head one phillips #0 x 4 inches one 1/4 x 4 inches flat head one phillips #1 x 4 inches one 3/16 x 4 inches flat head one phillips #2 x 6 inches one 1/8 x 6 inches flat head one phillips #3 x 6 inches long......all with cushion grips handles and magnetic tip,, magnet with a good force of atraction!! to hold the screw in place,then handles have a hole at the end so you can used as a torque... these are made in China, but they had a really good quality and price,,recomended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tech freak

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality screw driver set, the magnet tip is a bonus...
customer_reviews.author: Dave Gordon

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift and I would have liked a case with it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and I would have liked a case with it, but apart from that It was exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Meyler

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very good quality in an array of bits and sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set a must buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love that these have the magnetic end. Makes life so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: MMacGregor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent set of magnetic tools, a must have for any home
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good screwdrivers, but sometimes I find myself wishing the magnetic tips were just a little bit stronger.
customer_reviews.author: One Who Views Again

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great screwdrivers, love the magnet tips they really come in handy when building computers.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Spina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Soft grip on hand. Like the two thinner sized ones. Didn't have them in my original Stanley set.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: As expected - decent quality - ok for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic Tip - Cushion Grip Screwdriver Set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for a female homeowner to have for household use. Like the cushion grip and magnetic tip to help hold the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Leelee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exelente tool i love those tool I really happy thanks
customer_reviews.author: vipul bhakta

customer_reviews.title: Just get it.
customer_reviews.text: Quality.... get it. Love this set... needs stubbys and feels great in the hand. Magnetic as well.
customer_reviews.author: Craigheadpro

customer_reviews.title: Screw driver tip loses magnetic
customer_reviews.text: Screw driver tips lost their magnetism in less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Expert

customer_reviews.title: Screwdrivers doing their very best screwing...
customer_reviews.text: It's a set of screwdrivers! What do you want me to say??
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Pitz

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! Tried using 1 of the + drives yesterday and it stripped right away, when i tried to screw some screws into the table. $1 set from Harbor Freight did way better job than these..... So far tried one and sad results. If the rest will give me the same results, will change to 1 star review.
customer_reviews.author: TechieMaster

customer_reviews.title: High quality but nowhere to put them
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be high quality but would it have killed Stanley to include a cheap tray to hold them in? Once unpacked it's 8 screwdrivers in a pile. I would have preferred a smaller range of sizes but that's my fault for not paying attention.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the Stanley didn't include a sturdy carrying case. Would have come in handy for projects at other locations than my home, since I'm a handyman.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Handy item
customer_reviews.text: Great set of magnetic tipped screwdrivers. I have problems with numbness in my hands oand them being magnetized really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Kon

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. It seems you never have the right tool handy. That's why I bought another set to scatter around the house and garage.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Jingle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I made this purchase. These work great, and they're very comfortable in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. O.

product_meta.title: STANLEY 91-541 Cushion Grip Screwdriver Set, 8-Piece
product_meta.description: Soft-grip handle for excellent comfort and control. Chrome Plated Bars for corrosion resistance. Magnetic tips to help hold screws. . .
feature_bullets: Soft-grip handle for excellent comfort and control
Chrome Plated Bars for corrosion resistance
Magnetic tips to help hold screws
